## fic firewalls rules

Show Rules of Firewall

### Synopsis

Show Rules of Firewall

```
fic firewalls rules <id> [flags]
```

### Examples

```
fic firewalls rules F040123456789 --router F022000000335
```

```
      --router string   (required) Router ID
```
